Today I read a similar [post](https://come-from.mad-scientist.club/@algernon/statuses/01KA7F6NM12BVV7V96TP0KJF5F) and it reminded me again of my own (see thread), and what I forgot to mention..

This site and its content is meant for people, there's nothing (maybe 1%) that's of any use to any AI or aggregators.
